result.title: Catalogue of relevant spatial datasets for further GIS analyses on regional to local scale
result.description: The intended catalogue of important lithological structural hydrogeological and infrastructural datasets will be provided to interested groups and decision makers as a guideline for future prospection activities This summery will be based on the experiences and knowledge gained at the different test sites and will be mainly dependent on workpackages 2 to 4Risk issues due to data heterogeneity incomplete metadata diverse datasources and local mismatches will be minimised by early communication with EuroGeoSurvey and other relevant European groups involved in spatial data provision

result.title: European Scale map of future EGS projects for various European geological conditions
result.description: The envisaged European Scale map will improve the visibility of the findings of work packages 2 to 5 and will illustrate the transferability of the new and updated concepts to further target zonesThe validity of the map significantly depends on the outcomes of our partners as well as on an appropriate ratio between detailedness and generalization We will face this risk by regular communication with the other groups and by the testing of different scales and data homogenization levels

result.title: Web-based map tool and recommendations for further operation
result.description: The webbased map tool will allow decision makers and interested groups easy access to a wide range of freely available GIS datasets related to EGS and deep geothermal energy usage and will allocate exemplary data records of the test sitesA phase of intensive internet and literature research plus early interaction with European groups recently involved in data provision and exchange projects will minimize the risks of missing significant information or the redundancy with other European initiatives

result.title: Field-based characterisation of the four reservoir types completed
result.description: While D54 focuses on the delivery of data sets for the reservoir modelling D56 this delivery is the final report on the fieldbased petrological and structural characterisation of the four Variscan reservoir types This part also goes beyond the reservoir scale to evaluate the results at European scale D74 to D78 The results depend on the quality of the other deliverables but there is nearly no risk to get results at all

result.title: Roadmap for heat production from EU main geological contexts
result.description: D515 will gather mapping and data of most promising site to establish a strategy for heat exploitation from Sedimentary context using heat demand endusers such as agricultural or urban close to oil wellsGraniticmetamorphic context using heat available from an operating EGS plant producing fluid at low temperature and an existing district heatingThe report will deliver a list of most promising sites for heat exploitation and what will be the main capacities

result.title: Static and dynamic geothermal models of the four Variscan reservoir types at reservoir scale or as conceptual models
result.description: This deliverable will describe the initial models newly developed or preexistent at the different partners which are intended to be used as collaborative platform to integrate and refine the understanding of the geothermal system at outcrop analogue or reservoir scales Also the merits and flaws of the different models will be described based on the geological local conditions and degree of knowledge based on available data

result.title: Brine transportation field tests report
result.description: A report presenting the tested high temperature brine transportation technologies used on the field Onsite tests results are very important for upscaling geothermal plant with buried pipes The success of the field tests is related to the availability to fond on the market adapted material able to resist to high temperature and high salinity versus time

result.title: Atrial fibrillation use case in collaboration with the HealthyCloud project
result.description: In this task we will develop a machine learning pipeline for predictive modelling of atrial fibrillation by integrating imaging electrocardiography biomarkers and other phenotypic data The use case will be initially implemented with research data from the euCanSHare platform Furthermore in collaboration with the HealthyCloud project where the technical specifications for a similar use case based on health data will be gathered the work will be extended by interrogating additional datasets from clinical registries The encountered obstacles will be used to improve the final version of the euCanSHare platform as well as to support the definition of the HealthyCloud roadmap

result.title: Optimal usage of geothermal potential on already existing geothermal pilot sites
result.description: Using the D71 an analysis of the existing geothermal pilot sites in Variscan geology Gttingen in Germany Havelange in Belgium with already existing infrastructure and undertaken evaluations of geothermal potential is to be conducted Optimal wayof future geothermal energy usage on the existing pilot sites will be determined This deliverable highly depends on deliverable D71
